title: PulseFire ezreal Spectator Bug
body: When spectating a game with Pulsefire ezreal you can hear the AI female voice everytime ezreal backs. It occurs everytime you load into a game with him using that skin

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! Is a particular VO line that's playing, or is it playing various VO lines?
it says every recall line he has i think sorry for the delayed response x.x
No worries - I was on vacation. :P I'll follow up this week!
Lol its fine i hope your vacation was fun!
